title: Compute normal proportion for cola caffeine amount

content.question: The caffeine content of 8-ounce cans of a certain cola drink is approximately normally distributed with mean 33 milligrams (mg). A randomly selected 8-ounce can containing 35 mg of caffeine is 1.2 standard deviations above the mean. Approximately what percent of 8-ounce cans of the cola have a caffeine content greater than 35 mg?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
